3. Deliverables

• Organized permit prerequisite package for handoff to engineer.
• Memo summarizing key findings from value-add explorations.
• Preliminary site concepts (non-engineered) for client decision-making.
4. Pricing Structure
• Required Tasks: Flat fee or hourly (to be finalized).
• Value-Add Explorations: Can be bundled in or priced as a separate enhancement package.
